name: Black Caribou Print, on Light Grey
description: Mod Pieces has joined forces with The Shoppery to bring you this modern, rustic, Canadiana collection. This listing is for one 18" x 18" pillow cover. Save on shipping by purchasing a pillow insert locally. For a complete throw pillow, add an insert to your cart prior to checkout. Down/feather or polyfill Inserts sold separately here. Details... * Each print is an original hand drawing by The Shoppery * Each design has been screen printed by hand * Expect the imperfections that come with hand pulled screen prints * Each pillow cover is handmade in our studio * Printed on natural, grey linen * Backed in solid, black fabric * Zipper closure at base of pillow * Spot clean or dry clean * There are limited quantities of each design * Contact us for custom orders * Please allow 1 week for delivery of in-stock items * Please allow 2-3 weeks for custom orders * This item ships from Canada * It can be shipped to Canada or the USA * Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout

name: Sofia - Restyled Vintage Table Lamp
description:
Petite. Exotic. Spicy.

This simple, deep brown, glazed pottery lamp has been topped with a newly constructed shade, outfitted in a multi-coloured, ikat fabric.

Each Mod Pieces lamp is…

Vintage. 20+ years old.
Unique. Where vintage meets modern.
Eco-friendly. Everything that can be salvaged, is.
Cool. These lamps are anything but average.
Handcrafted. Each shade is constructed by hand, not machine.

Details...

* 4.5" wide (at the widest part of the base)
* 21" high (to the top of the shade)
* 10" x 10" lamp shade
* Professionally rewired (black cord & new socket)
* Small & sturdy
* This lamp ships from Canada
* It can be shipped to Canada or the USA
* Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout

Each Mod Pieces lamp is…

Vintage. 20+ years old.
Unique. Where vintage meets modern.
Eco-friendly. Everything that can be salvaged, is.
Cool. These lamps are anything but average.
Handcrafted. Each shade is constructed by hand, not machine.

Details…

* 6" wide (at the widest part of the base)
* 27" high (to the top of the shade)
* 10" x 15" lamp shades
* Professionally rewired (white cord & tri-light socket)
* One lamp wobbles slightly
* These lamps ship from Canada
* They can be shipped to Canada or the USA
* Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout

For a complete throw pillow, add an insert to your cart prior to checkout. Down/feather or polyfill Inserts sold separately here. name: Anatomy Lamp Shade - Heart, with Red Embroidery
description:
Rad. Raw. Risqué.

Mod Pieces has joined forces with Evann Frisque to bring you a limited edition collection of one of a kind lamp shades.

The Anatomy Collection begins with Evann's hand drawn organs. After screen printing the images onto recycled cotton, she completes the textile with free motion embroidery, highlighting the vital nature of the organ. Inspired by the concept that art can also be functional, Lia has skillfully constructed each textile into a hardback, rolled-top lamp shade, using new and reclaimed materials. Details… * 11” top x 12” bottom x 10” side * Spider fitting * Harp & washer included * Works best with an 18”+ height lamp * Recycled Cotton * 100% water-based, non-toxic dyes * This lamp shade ships from Canada * It can be shipped to Canada or the USA * Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout

name: Houndstooth Print Lamp Shade, Fiz & Foster
description: Fun. Daring. Playful. Mod Pieces has joined forces with Avril Loreti to bring you a fun & graphic, limited edition collection of one of a kind lamp shades. Textile Designer, Avril Loreti, creates patterns for the modern home based on the shapes that she finds in the world around her. Lia Fagan, the designer behind Mod Pieces, met Avril at the Toronto One of a Kind Show, where they were each exhibiting. Avril’s angular prints & off-beat colour schemes were what first attracted Lia to her work. This collection of limited edition lamp shades is the result of their collaborative efforts. Each pattern was designed digitally by Avril & printed here, in North America. Each shade has been carefully constructed by Lia using new & reclaimed materials. Details… * 11” top x 12” bottom x 10” side * Spider fitting * Harp & washer included * Works best with an 18”+ height lamp * Fabric is cotton twill * Lamp not included * This lamp shade ships from Canada * It can be shipped to Canada or the USA * Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout View the Avril Loreti Collection Lookbook.

Details… * 12” top x 13” bottom x 14.25” side * Spider fitting * Harp & washer included * Works best with a 20”+ height lamp * Fabric is cotton twill * Lamp not included * This lamp shade ships from Canada * It can be shipped to Canada or the USA * Shipping charges & applicable taxes will be added at checkout View the Avril Loreti Collection Lookbook.

name: 18" x 18" Down/Feather Pillow Insert
description:
Details…

* 18" x 18" pillow insert
* Fits inside all of our standard pillow covers
* 5% white goose down, 95% white goose feathers
* Washed & odour free
* In a T255 100% cotton down proof shell
* Made with new material only and sterilized down/feather filling

name: 18" x 18" Polyfill Pillow Insert
description:
Details…

* 18" x 18" pillow insert
* Fits inside all of our standard pillow covers
